root.name: Worms and Reinforcements: United
root.description: PC Requirements (Sold-Out Software) 486SX-25 (min.), 486DX4-100 (rec.); MS DOS or Windows 95/98 or ME; 2x CD ROM (Min), 4x CD ROM (Rec); 4 MB of RAM (Min), 4x CD ROM (Rec); 512k video card (Min), 1MB video card (Rec); Soundblaster 8 bit/Ultrasound (512k) (Min); Mouse Keyboard.
